landing.hero_desc: Your Complete Digital Fashion Partner. We provide full digital support—photos, content, reels—so you just buy and sell.
landing.why_us_desc: Because we don't just sell products; we provide all digital services. Just buy and sell! Social media photos, content, reels, site images - we handle it all for you.
landing.service_1_desc: We bring your unique designs to life with premium quality.
landing.service_2_desc: Comprehensive wholesale and after-sales service you can trust.
landing.service_3_desc: Professional product photos, reels, and social content included.
landing.wholesale_desc: Exclusive designs for retailers worldwide with competitive pricing and volume discounts.
landing.photography_desc: Professional studio photography for your collections with high-end equipment.
landing.video_desc: Cinematic video production for social media and advertising campaigns.
landing.content_desc: Professional content creation services for your brand.
landing.collections_desc: Discover our newest arrivals, designed for the modern woman mixed with timeless elegance.
landing.cta_desc: Join our global network of retailers and experience premium quality fashion with Minel Aşk.

shop.title: Shop Our Collection
shop.explore_desc: Explore our premium selection for wholesale partners.
shop.no_products_desc: Try adjusting your search or filters.

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.min_order_error_desc: Minimum total order quantity is 15 items.
cart.order_success_desc: Your order #{number} has been submitted. We will contact you shortly via WhatsApp.

product.min_order_help_global: Min. order: 15 items total (mix & match allowed).
product.min_order_help: Minimum {count} units required for this item.

services.hero_desc: At Minel Aşk, we don't just sell garments — we provide a complete fashion ecosystem. From exclusive evening wear to digital content creation, we empower your business to thrive in the competitive fashion industry.
services.service1_desc: Discover our extensive collection of luxury evening dresses and modest swimwear. Each piece is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, using premium fabrics that exude elegance and sophistication. Our wholesale program offers retailers access to exclusive designs at competitive prices, with flexible minimum order quantities and worldwide shipping.
services.service1_feature1_desc: Hand-embellished gowns and cocktail dresses for special occasions
services.service1_feature2_desc: Stylish burkinis and modest beachwear collections
services.service1_feature3_desc: Minimum orders starting from 12 pieces per style
services.service1_feature4_desc: Delivered to over 50 countries with express options
services.service2_desc: In today's digital marketplace, stunning visuals are essential. Our in-house creative studio produces professional photography and video content that makes your products irresistible. From high-resolution product shots to engaging social media reels, we provide all the digital assets you need to sell successfully online.
services.service2_feature1_desc: High-resolution product images with consistent styling
services.service2_feature2_desc: Cinematic product videos and model showcases
services.service2_feature3_desc: Trending short-form content for Instagram and TikTok
services.service2_feature4_desc: Optimized images for all major marketplace platforms
services.service3_desc: Have a unique design concept? Our skilled artisans bring your vision to reality. We specialize in custom garment production with premium materials and expert craftsmanship. From initial sketch to final product, we work closely with you to create pieces that perfectly match your brand's aesthetic and quality standards.
services.service3_feature1_desc: Bring your sketches and ideas to our design team
services.service3_feature2_desc: Access to exclusive fabrics and embellishments
services.service3_feature4_desc: Rigorous quality control at every production stage
services.service4_desc: We believe language should never be a barrier to great business relationships. Our multilingual team ensures seamless communication in Turkish, Arabic, and English. Whether you're in Istanbul, Dubai, or London, you'll receive personalized support from dedicated account managers who understand your market.
services.service4_feature1_desc: Native speakers for local market expertise
services.service4_feature4_desc: Full RTL language support and cultural understanding
services.service4_feature2_desc: WhatsApp support across all time zones
services.benefit1_desc: Every garment undergoes strict quality checks before shipping
services.benefit2_desc: Quick production and shipping times to keep your inventory fresh
services.benefit3_desc: Years of experience in Middle Eastern and European fashion markets
services.process_step1_desc: Discuss your needs, budget, and timeline with our team
services.process_step2_desc: Browse our catalog or share your custom design requirements
services.process_step3_desc: We prepare your order with meticulous attention to quality
services.process_step4_desc: Receive your products with all digital content ready for immediate sales
services.cta_desc: Join hundreds of successful retailers who trust Minel Aşk as their fashion partner. Let's discuss how we can support your growth.

contact.hero_desc: Every great partnership begins with a conversation. Reach out and let's transform your fashion business into something extraordinary.
contact.whatsapp_desc: Prefer quick answers? Message us directly on WhatsApp for immediate assistance from our dedicated team.
contact.location_desc: Experience our collections in person. Our Istanbul showroom welcomes partners from around the world.
contact.social_desc: Stay inspired with our latest collections, behind-the-scenes content, and success stories from our global partners.
contact.cta_text: Your success story begins with a single message. Let's build something beautiful together.

warnings.moq_desc: Some items are below the minimum order quantity. Please increase quantities in your cart.
